description:
Vicks VapoDrops Butter Menthol lozenges soothes the throat clears the nose

Vicks VapoDrops temporarily relieves sore throat and blocked nose It soothes the throat and clears the nose
For the throat The proven Vicks medications soothes and cools irritated throats
For the nose Vicks vapour action clears and cools nasal passages fast
Available in 4 flavours Original Menthol Butter Menthol Burst of Mint and Cooling Peppermint
Standard sizes 10 drops 24 drops 27 drops 30 drops
Now available in Mega Value Pack in 2 flavours Original Menthol and Butter Menthol


Vicks VapoDrops will quickly relieve the throat tickle that precedes a coughing fit and could prevent you from using your voice with confidence The lozengeswill help to clear nose and soothe your throat Feel the effect in seconds

Temporarily relieves sore throat and blocked nose

For the throat The proven Vicks medication soothes and cools irritated throats

For the nose Vicks vapour action clears and cools nasal passages fast

Soothes the throat clears the nose
name: Vicks Vapodrops Throat Lozenges Butter Menthol 42 Pack
